clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: Focal uptake in soft tissue of thigh consistent with post-surgical changes.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in soft tissue of thigh, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Mild inflammatory uptake in soft tissue of thigh region.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
